Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pizza

  • public class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
    This class emulates a simple pizza, that allows the user to input the amount of toppings, and the size of the pizza.
    Since:
    22 March 2016
    Author:
    Mark Eikel

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int numch 
      private int numham 
      private int numpep 
      private int size 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pizza()
      Initializes all of the private fields to zero, effectively setting the cost to 0.
      Pizza(int s, int ch, int pep, int ham)
      Saves a lot of time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pizza

        Pizza()
        Initializes all of the private fields to zero, effectively setting the cost to 0.

      • Pizza

        Pizza(int s,
      int ch,
      int pep,
      int ham)
        Saves a lot of time. Allows the user to input all of the values of the pizza on creation.
        Parameters:
        s - Int size of the pizza can't be bigger than 3.
        ch - Number of cheeses to add to pizza. 2$ a piece.
        pep - Number of pepperoni to add to pizza. 2$
        ham - Number of ham toppings to add to pizza. 2$

    • Method Detail

      • setSize

        void setSize(int s)
        Sets the size of the pizza, 1-3 set it to small,medium,large in order. Anything over does not modify the size.
        Parameters:
        s - Size of the pizza (int)1-3.

      • setCheese

        void setCheese(int ch)
        Sets the number of cheeses, any integer allowed.
        Parameters:
        ch - number of cheeses to add.

      • setPepperoni

        void setPepperoni(int pep)
        Sets the number of pepperoni.
        Parameters:
        pep - number of pepperonis on the pizza. Any int allowed.

      • setHam

        void setHam(int ham)
        Sets the number of ham toppings on the pizza.
        Parameters:
        ham - number of ham toppings on the pizza. Any int.

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Returns the size of the pizza 1-3.
        Returns:
        Size of the pizza, has to be 1-3.

      • getCheese

        int getCheese()
        Returns the amount of cheeses on the pizza.
        Returns:
        number of cheeses on pizza.

      • getPepperoni

        int getPepperoni()
        Returns the number of pepperoni toppings on pizza.
        Returns:
        number of pepperoni toppings on pizza.

      • getHam

        int getHam()
        Returns the number of ham toppings on the pizza.
        Returns:
        number of ham toppings on the pizza.

      • getToppings

        int getToppings()
        Returns the total number of toppings on the pizza.
        Returns:
        total toppings (ch + pep + ham).

      • calcCost

        double calcCost()
        Calculates the total cost of the pizza. Gathers the total toppings, multiplies by 2x and adds the flat fee.
        Returns:
        total cost of the pizza.

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns a string that outputs all the contents of the pizza.
        Returns:
        The total, verbose list of what makes up this pizz.
